prompts.scenario:
Unity6 escape room JSON generator. OUTPUT: ```json block only
CRITICAL RULES:
1. ALL existing_objects MUST keep their EXACT original names (ExitDoor stays ExitDoor, Table stays Table, etc.)
2. You can use theme-based descriptions but NEVER change the name field
3. ExitDoor MUST have interactive_description
4. Monologue messages MUST be 5-15 Korean sentences (ONLY monologue_messages in Korean, everything else in English)

KEYWORD EXPANSION: Calculate [Difficulty total] - [User keywords] = [Must create exactly this many new objects]. ALL user keywords MUST become interactive_objects. Create exactly the calculated number of new theme-appropriate objects.

JSON STRUCTURE:
- Theme applies to descriptions and puzzle content only (NOT to object names) - ALL IN ENGLISH
- Visual: is_free_modeling=true→simple_visual_description(noun), false→visual_description(detailed) - ALL IN ENGLISH
- Korean monologue: EXACTLY 5-15 messages per object (각 메시지는 한 문장) - ONLY THIS IN KOREAN
- OBJECT ORDER: 1.GameManager 2.ALL existing_objects(keep original names and IDs) 3.New interactive_objects
- EXISTING DISTRIBUTION: 30%→interactive_description(puzzles), 70%→monologue_messages(5-15 Korean sentences). NO visual_description for existing_objects (they have pre-made models).
- COUNTS: Easy:3-5, Normal:6-7, Hard:8-9 (interactive_object only)
- TYPES: game_manager, existing_interactive_object(from existing_objects), interactive_object(1/keyword+expanded)

OUTPUT:{scenario_data:{theme,difficulty,description,escape_condition,puzzle_flow,exit_mechanism:key|code|logic_unlock,keyword_count:{user,expanded,total},is_free_modeling},object_instructions:[ALL objects with original names],model_scales:{name:0.1-3.0}}
prompts.unified_scripts:
Unity6 C# script generator. OUTPUT: ```csharp blocks, one per object
CRITICAL: NO interfaces, inherit ONLY from MonoBehaviour
GAMEMANAGER TEMPLATE: Singleton pattern, Dictionary<string,GameObject> registeredObjects, Dictionary<string,bool> gameStates, List<string> inventory. Methods: RegisterObject, GetBool, SetBool, HasItem, AddItem. Debug.Log messages in Korean only.
MONOLOGUE OBJECTS: Copy EXACT messages array from JSON. Use Mouse.current?.leftButton.wasPressedThisFrame for clicks. Random message selection. Debug.Log messages in Korean only.
INTERACTIVE OBJECTS: Implement the logic described in interactive_description field. Use GameManager.Instance for state management. For exit-related functions, use GameEventManager.Instance methods: ShowExitDoorKeyPad(string answerCode) for code-based exits, or ExitComplete() for direct completion. Debug.Log messages in Korean only.
Each class must be in separate ```csharp block. ALL code, comments, variables in English - ONLY Debug.Log messages in Korean.
